name: Victor Spumante And The Raindrops of Burgundy
name_original: Victor Spumante And The Raindrops of Burgundy
description:
The game was made for Ludum Dare 44 game jam. The theme was "Your life is currency".

The game is about a gentleman called Victor Spumante, who is the last man an earth, surviving in his lonely castle in a world overtaken by vampires.

It is a trash game, developed in a stream of consciousness style. A devlog is available on my Twitter https://twitter.com/gimblll/status/1122045038400286720
